trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around April 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was asleep and i saw this ufo land on my roof, it then picked up a cow from my roof and brought it aboard it's ship. The ufo later returned except it had removed the cow's nose. How did it smell? Terrible.
